info.title: AIO Tests REST APIs
info.description:
AIO Tests exposes a set of endpoints to create your Cycles and report execution statuses from any tool used for automating tests. By allowing to capture automation results, AIO Tests empowers you to view all your testing progress at one place.

Use the `API Token` generated from 'AIO Tests -> My Settings -> API Token' as Authorization Header (```AioAuth ```) to get started.

For queries, you can visit our extensive [documentation.](https://aiosupport.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/AioTests/pages/1970241685/Automated+Testing+Essentials)

post.summary: Upload and attach files to case
post.description: This API can be used for uploading files as attachments to a case

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Case version number to be used, if Case Key is supplied in the testCaseId parameter. If unset or left blank, latest Case version will be picked. This parameter will be ignored, if Case Id  is supplied in the testCaseId parameter.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Upload and attach files to case RTF fields
post.description: This API can be used for uploading files as attachments to a case fields. Supported fields: DESCRIPTION, PRECONDITIONS

parameters.name: fieldId
parameters.description: RTF field. Supported fields: DESCRIPTION, PRECONDITIONS

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Case version number to be used, if Case Key is supplied in the testCaseId parameter. If unset or left blank, latest Case version will be picked. This parameter will be ignored, if Case Id  is supplied in the testCaseId parameter.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Upload and attach files to case step
post.description: This API can be used for uploading files as attachments to a case step

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Case version number to be used, if Case Key is supplied in the testCaseId parameter. If unset or left blank, latest Case version will be picked. This parameter will be ignored, if Case Id  is supplied in the testCaseId parameter.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Upload and attach files to case step RTF fields
post.description: This API can be used for uploading files as attachments to a case step fields. Supported fields: STEP, DATA, EXPECTED_RESULTS

parameters.name: fieldId
parameters.description: RTF field. Supported fields: STEP, DATA, EXPECTED_RESULTS

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Case version number to be used, if Case Key is supplied in the testCaseId parameter. If unset or left blank, latest Case version will be picked. This parameter will be ignored, if Case Id  is supplied in the testCaseId parameter.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Upload and attach evidence to cycle
post.description: This API can be used for uploading test automation execution evidence as attachments to the cycle

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Upload and attach files to cycle RTF fields
post.description: This API can be used for uploading files as attachments to a cycle fields. Supported fields: OBJECTIVE & Custom fields of type MULTI_LINE_TEXT (RTF).

parameters.name: fieldId
parameters.description: Supported fields: OBJECTIVE & Custom fields of type MULTI_LINE_TEXT (RTF). Use Custom Field ID or Name.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Upload and attach evidence to latest test run of case
post.description: This API can be used for uploading test automation execution evidence as attachments to the latest run of case

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Upload and attach evidence to case runs
post.description: This API can be used for uploading test automation execution evidence as attachments

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Upload and attach evidence to case steps
post.description: This API can be used for uploading test automation execution evidence as attachments to test run steps

parameters.name: testRunStepId
parameters.description: Run Step id [ID of step, not stepID]

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Add an existing case to cycle or a create a new run if a run exists and return the run created
post.description: This API can be used to add an existing case to a cycle or create a new run if case exists in the cycle and returns the full run details

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: This is only applicable while adding a Case to the Cycle. Case version number to be used, if Case Key is supplied in the testCaseId parameter. If unset or left blank, latest Case version will be picked. This parameter will be ignored, if Case Id  is supplied in the testCaseId parameter or if a Case with the supplied Key already exists in the Cycle.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Create a batch process to import automated test execution results from results xml file.
post.description: This API can be used to create a batch for uploading test automation execution results.  Batches are visible on the Cycles screen.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Add multiple existing cases to set
post.description: This API can be used for adding existing cases to the set, if the case does not already exist in the set. Latest version of the case will be added to the Set.

parameters.name: testCases
parameters.description: List of Test Case keys or ids

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Add multiple existing cases to cycle, add new runs for existing cases and update status of already created runs
post.description:
This API can be used for multiple tasks :
  • Update status of existing runs for cases added in cycle
  • Add already created cases to the cycle
  • Update the last run result, by setting createNewRun flag to false
  • Create a new run and update it's results, by setting createNewRun to true
Execution mode is marked as automated for new runs, if not otherwise specified.

parameters.name: createNewRun
parameters.description:
To create a new run, set to true.
To update existing last run details, set to false or do not specify param
If a Case is being added, a new run is created by default and value is ignored.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be accepted for Case's Multiline (RTF) field values.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be treated as text.
Be careful while setting the value of this flag. Use the same value as used while fetching the Case via GET API.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

put.summary: Bulk update fields of test runs
put.description: This API can be used for bulk update of test run custom fields.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

put.summary: Batch job for bulk update fields of test runs
put.description: This API can be used for bulk update of test run custom fields in a batch.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

put.summary: Clean up runs from a Cycle
put.description: This API can be used for deleting older runs from a Cycle.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.summary: Get tags defined by your team in Jira project
get.description:
GET call returns the tag IDs and details, defined within AIO Tests for a given Jira Project.
These details can be used to attach specific tags while creating new cycles using the Cycle Creation POST call.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Create new tags or get existing tags defined by your team in Jira project
post.description:
POST call returns the tag IDs and details of the newly created tags, or matching existing tags defined within AIO Tests for a given Jira Project.
These details can be used to attach specific tags while creating new cycles using the Cycle Creation POST call.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.description: GET call returns paginated Case list

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description:
The index of the first item to return [eg.. to get items 101 to 200, set value to 100 ].
Default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of items to return per page.
Default value is 100. If value is less than 10 or more than 100, page size will be set to 100.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Create a new Case
post.description:
This API creates a new case.
A quick Case can be created by just specifying title.No other field is mandatory.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be accepted for Case's Multiline (RTF) field values.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be treated as text.
Be careful while setting the value of this flag. Use the same value as used while fetching the Case via GET API.

parameters.name: uniqueAutoKey
parameters.description:
If set to True, enforces that new case is not created if automation key is present in another case
If unset OR set to False, a case would be created even if automation key (if present in body) exists in another case.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Create a new Cycle for execution
post.description:
This API creates a new empty Cycle.
A quick Cycle can be created by just specifying title.No other field is mandatory.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Create a new Set
post.description:
This API creates a new empty Set.
A quick Set can be created by just specifying title.No other field is mandatory.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

delete.description:
This API can be used for deleting a empty Cycle.
If the Cycle has Cases, to delete the Cycle, set query string parameter emptyCycleBeforeDelete as true.

parameters.name: emptyCycleBeforeDelete
parameters.description: Pass the value as true to remove all Cases from the cycle before deletion of Cycle.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.summary: Get the run details of a testrun in a Cycle by run ID
get.description: This API can be used for retrieve the  Run details of a specific run in a Cycle.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Update all details of a run including step level details, run comments and defects
post.description: This API can be used to update the entire run details including status of run and steps and comments and defects of both

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be accepted for Case's Multiline (RTF) field values.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be treated as text.
Be careful while setting the value of this flag. Use the same value as used while fetching the Case via GET API.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

delete.description: This API can be used for deleting a non latest run.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Export BDD/Gherkin cases into feature files.
post.description: Export BDD/Gherkin cases into feature files. Exported feature files will be exported in zipped format. Cases can grouped by FOLDER / REQUIREMENT / TAG. Use NONE to ignore grouping.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Cases can grouped by FOLDER / REQUIREMENT / TAG. Use NONE or keep empty to ignore grouping.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.description: GET call returns status of automation import results batch .

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.description: GET call returns a list of created Custom Fields (Environment, Build etc)

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.description: GET call returns a list of Custom Field Types (NUMBER, BOOLEAN etc)

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.summary: Get the latest Run details of a Case in a Cycle
get.description: This API can be used for retrieve the latest Run details of a Case in a Cycle. This API can be used to check the Run status, Actual Effort etc.

parameters.name: fetchDetails
parameters.description: If set to true, all details of run are fetched, including comments, defects, attachments and all step level details

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

put.summary: Get or create Case folder hierarchy if it does not exists
put.description:
Get folder hierarchy or create hierarchy if it does not exists.
Method will return the leaf folder. The ID can be used to create new case in the created folder hierarchy.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

put.summary: Get or create Cycle folder hierarchy if it does not exists
put.description:
Get folder hierarchy or create hierarchy if it does not exists.
Method will return the leaf folder. The ID can be used to create new cycle in the created folder hierarchy.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.description: GET call returns Project Configuration (Case Priority, Case Type, Case Status, Automation Status & Run Status) values for the Project in a single call.

get.description: GET call returns a list of the available Case Automation Status (Manual, To Be Automated, Automated, etc.).

get.description: GET call returns Case data like folder, tags, title, key etc.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF

If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

parameters.name: needAttachments

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

put.description:
This API updates an existing Case. All non Read-Only case parameters can be updated using this API.
Usage: Fetch the existing case details using Get Case Details API. Update the required parameters and call this API.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be accepted for Case's Multiline (RTF) field values.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be treated as text.
Be careful while setting the value of this flag. Use the same value as used while fetching the Case via GET API.

parameters.name: needAttachments
parameters.description: If set to True, Attachments associated with the Case or Case's Multiline (RTF) fields will be returned in the response.

parameters.name: version

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.

If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be accepted for Cycle's Multiline (RTF) field values.

get.description:
GET Cycle folders returns the folder tree for Cycles.
The IDs of the folders can be used to create new cycles in specific folders using the Cycle Creation POST call.

parameters.description:
The index of the first item to return [eg. to get items 101 to 200, set value to 100 ].
Default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of items to return per page.
Default value is 100. If value is less than 10 or more than 100, page size will be set to 100.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

GET call returns a list of the available Run Statuses (Passed, Failed, Blocked, etc.).
Run Status IDs can be used while updating status of existing cases in a Cycle via the POST call or
to understand the test run distribution returned by the Get Cycle Summary call.

get.summary: Get traceability information for specified Requirement Id (Jira Issue Id)
get.description:
GET call returns list of Cases associated with a Requirement. It will also return the latest Run information for the Case.
Runs will be sorted in Descending order of Created date.

parameters.name: maxRunCount
parameters.description: If set, only specified number of Runs are returned. Otherwise, all Runs for a Case will be returned.

parameters.name: runCreatedSinceDays
parameters.description: If set, only Runs which are created within the specified days are returned. Otherwise, all Runs for a Case will be returned.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

parameters.name: includeAllVersions
parameters.description: If set to True, all the Case Versions linked to the requirement will be returned. Otherwise, only those Cases will be returned for which the latest version is linked to the requirement.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Import cases from feature file.
post.description:
This API creates a new case or updates an existing case if a scenario is tagged.
Existing case folder and status, if set, will not be updated.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Import automated test execution results from results xml file.
post.description: This API can be used for uploading test automation execution results

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Migrate Runs to AIO Tests. This API will allow to create back dated Runs.
post.description: This API will add the Case to exiting Cycle (if it is not already added) and will create a new back dated Run.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Migrate Cycle details
post.description:
This API creates a new empty Cycle.
The `createdDate` can be set to any date in the past .Other than creating back-dated cycles, it is similar to the create cycle API.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Migrate Runs to AIO Tests in Bulk. This API will allow to create back dated Runs.
post.description:
This API will add the Cases to exiting Cycle (if it is not already added) and will create new back dated Runs.
A maximum of 1000 runs can be imported per request. This can be any combination such as 10 cases with 100 runs each, 100 cases with 10 runs each, 1000 cases with 1 run each, or any other combination not exceeding 1000 runs total.

parameters.name: returnFullRunResponse
parameters.description: Return full Run response. If set to true, the response will include the full run object. If false, only the created Run ID's will be returned.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Post a comment to run of a testcase, identified by a run id
post.description: This API can be used post a comment to the latest run of a case

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be accepted for Case's Multiline (RTF) field values.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be treated as text.
Be careful while setting the value of this flag. Use the same value as used while fetching the Case via GET API.

post.description: This API can be used post a comment to the latest run of a case

If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be accepted for Case's Multiline (RTF) field values.

Be careful while setting the value of this flag. Use the same value as used while fetching the Case via GET API.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Create a new Cycle from existing Sets
post.description:
This API creates a new Cycle from existing Sets. Tags and component of the first set are copied to the newly created cycle. The API also adds all eligible cases (published cases) from the source Sets to the newly created Cycle.
A run is automatically created for each of the added case.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

put.description: This API can be used for resetting the status, comments, defects and all data in a run

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

get.description: Retrieve attachments associated with different entities using the attachment ID

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

The index of the first item to return [eg. to get items 101 to 200, set value to 100].
Default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxResults

The maximum number of items to return per page.
Default value is 100. If value is less than 10 or more than 100, page size will be set to 100.

parameters.description:
The maximum number of items to return per page.
Default value is 100. If value is less than 10 or more than 100, page size will be set to 100.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

post.summary: Search Sets
post.description: POST call returns paginated Set list filtered as per the provided search criteria

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description:
The index of the first item to return [eg. to get items 101 to 200, set value to 100 ].
Default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of items to return per page.
Default value is 100. If value is less than 10 or more than 100, page size will be set to 100.

parameters.name: needDataInRTF
parameters.description:
If set to True, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be returned in the response.
If unset OR set to False, Rich Text Format meta data (html tags) will be filtered out from the response.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

put.description: This API marks a Cycle as Locked or Closed.

400 Bad Request.description: Request is malformed or mandatory data is missing

file.description: Form data, supported formats : all image types and .pdf, .txt, .csv, .doc, .docx, .ppt, .pptx, .xls, .xlsx, .json, .yaml, .xml, .gif, .mov, .webm, .mp4, .feature, .zip, .rar, .sas, .pcap, .wav, .html, .htm, .log, .msg, .eml, .pem, .s2p

description.example: Steps represented in default representation - step, data and expected results

isEnabled.description: Indicates if the Script Type is enabled

description.example: The test is ready for execution

step.description:
Action which needs to be performed to validate the application.

NOTE: To be used when stepType is "TEXT"
step.example: Login into application using User credentials

data.description:
Data to be used in the step.

NOTE: To be used when stepType is "TEXT"

expectedResult.description:
Expected behaviour after performing the step.

NOTE: To be used when stepType is "TEXT"
expectedResult.example: User should land on the home page

stepType.description: Step Type (Text, Referenced or BDD keywords)

bddStep.description:
BDD Action which needs to be performed to validate the application.

NOTE: To be used when stepType is of BDD type

gherkinKeyword.description:
Step Type in default gherkin language.

NOTE: To be used when stepType is of BDD type

CaseStep.description:
Step associated with the Case.

NOTE: For create and update of case details, if the step type is "REFERENCE", the following rules apply to the "referencedCase" object: If case ID is provided, it will be used to pick the case version; If only the case key is provided, the latest version will be used; If both key and version are provided, the specified version will be used.

isArchived.description: Indicates if the type has been archived

isDefault.description: Indicates the user selected default value for Type

NumberValue.description: Value for custom field of type NUMBER

value.description:
Permission on the Entity (Case / Cycle / Run etc).
The permission value is a bit map representing the access the User has on the entity.
Last 3 bits from right to left represent the permission of Delete, Write & Read.
7 - Full access (Delete, Write, Read)
3 - Only Write and Read
1 - Only Read
0 - No permission

error.description: Reason for restricted access on the entity

Permission.description: Represents permissions user has on the entity

createNewRun.description:
Form data: Set to true if a new run should be created for the case and execution status set against the new run.
Set to false to update existing run.

addCaseToCycle.description:
Form data: Set to true if Case from the results file should be added to the cycle, if it is not already existing.
If not set, such a Case would be reported as an error.

createCase.description:
Form data: Set to true to create a new case, if no mapping is found. Case is created with method name in title.
If not set, such a Case would be reported as an error.

ignoreClassInAutoKey.description: Only applies to JUnit.  Form data: Set to true to ignore classname and use only methodname from Junit file for automation key. Use when classname does not guarantee uniqueness or has a irrelevant value.

bddForceUpdateCase.description: Form data: Set to true to update case steps with those found in scenario. Use if automated scenarios get updated and changes need to be percolated to AIO Tests cases.

examplesAsCases.description: Form data: Affects only scenario outline cases.  Set to true to create/update each example as a separate cases and not as a single scenario outline case Note that scenario outline cases need to be created/updated from Case Details and cannot be created/updated from results file otherwise.

updateDatasets.description: Form data: Affects only TestNG/JUnit cases.  Only impacts tests based on datasets. Set to false to prevent datasets from being updated from results file. Helpful in retries where subset of datasets may have been executed.

forceUpdateCase.description: Form data: Affects only Robot, JUnit, TestNg and NUnit. Set to false to prevent case from being updated from results file. Helpful if users dont want to update the case from the file.

defaultFolder.description: Form data: Set the folder id to select the default folder for the newly imported cases.Helpful if users want to select default folder for their imported cases.

updateOnlyRunStatus.description: Form data: Affects Cucumber, Robot, and Newman. Only impacts tests with steps. Set to true to update test run-level details while preventing steps from being updated from the results file. Helpful for users who want to bypass step comparison and update only run-level details.

SearchCriteriaBooleanValue.description: Search criteria to find entity by comparing attribute value against the specified boolean value.

SearchCriteriaCustomFieldDateValue.description: Search criteria to find entity by comparing custom field value against specified Date values.

SearchCriteriaCustomFieldListValueIntege.description: Search criteria to find entity by comparing custom field value against specified List values. Use for Custom Field of type SINGLE_SELECT_LIST, MULTI_SELECT_LIST, COLOR_SELECTOR, JIRA_FIELD

SearchCriteriaCustomFieldListValueString.description: Search criteria to find entity by comparing custom field value against specified List values. Use for Custom Field of type BOOLEAN, SINGLE_USER_SELECTOR, MULTI_USER_SELECTOR

SearchCriteriaCustomFieldNumberValue.description: Search criteria to find entity by comparing custom field value against specified Numeric values.

SearchCriteriaCustomFieldValueObject.description: Search criteria to find entity by comparing custom field value against specified values.

value2.description: Date value2. This value is required for 'BETWEEN' comparison criteria. For other comparisonTypes it will be ignored.

SearchCriteriaDateValue.description:
Search criteria to find entity by comparing attribute value against specified date values.
Dates can be specified either using Unix timestamp in milliseconds (For ex: 1574416800000) OR using standard date time format like yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z' and EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss zzz. (For ex: 2019-11-22T10:00:00.000Z or Fri, 23 April 2021 23:59:59 HST).
Value1 is mandatory for 'BEFORE', 'AFTER', 'EQUALS' & 'BETWEEN' comparisonType.
Value2 is only required for 'BETWEEN' comparisonType.
To search for entities where value is not set, use comparisonType as 'EMPTY'. value1 and value2 will be ignored.

SearchCriteriaListValueInteger.description:
Search criteria to find entity by checking attribute value against specified List of values.
To search for entities where attribute is not set, add null to the list. For ex: To search for entities where Jira Component is not set, use list value as [null].
The list should contain at-least one value. And at-most can have 100 values.

SearchCriteriaListValueString.description:
Search criteria to find entity by checking attribute value against specified List of values.
To search for entities where attribute is not set, add null to the list. For ex: To search for entities where Jira Component is not set, use list value as [null].
The list should contain at-least one value. And at-most can have 100 values.

number2.description: Numeric value2. This value is required for 'BETWEEN' comparison criteria. For other comparisonTypes it will be ignored.

SearchCriteriaNumberValue.description:
Search criteria to find entity by comparing attribute value against specified numeric values.
Value1 is mandatory for 'GREATER_THAN', 'LESS_THAN', 'EQUALS' & 'BETWEEN' comparisonType.
Value2 is only required for 'BETWEEN' comparisonType.
To search for entities where value is not set, use comparisonType as 'EMPTY'. value1 and value2 will be ignored.

SearchCriteriaTextValue.description: Search criteria to find entity by comparing attribute value against the specified text. Search will be case sensitive.

isAutomated.description: Execution mode of this run, whether it is an automated run or a manual run.  Defaults to true
